nodes.body:
I think we should prove the more general result using epi instead of split epi. Here is a chunk of code for the case of effective epi:
```lean
noncomputable def effectiveEpiStructOfComp {C : Type*} [Category C]
  {Z Y X : C} (g : Z ⟶ Y) (f : Y ⟶ X) [EffectiveEpi (g ≫ f)] [Epi g] :
    EffectiveEpiStruct f where
  desc {W} φ h := EffectiveEpi.desc (g ≫ f) (g ≫ φ) (fun {T} g₁ g₂ eq => by
      simpa only [assoc] using h (g₁ ≫ g) (g₂ ≫ g) (by simpa only [assoc] using eq))
  fac {W} φ h := by rw [← cancel_epi g, ← assoc, EffectiveEpi.fac]
  uniq {W} φ h m hm := EffectiveEpi.uniq (g ≫ f) _ _ _ (by rw [assoc, hm])
```

The proofs are even easier! It is similar for epimorphic families of morphisms:

```lean
noncomputable def effectiveEpiFamilyStructOfComp {C : Type*} [Category C]
    {I : Type*} {Z Y : I → C} {X : C} (g : ∀ i, Z i ⟶ Y i) (f : ∀ i, Y i ⟶ X)
    [EffectiveEpiFamily _ (fun i => g i ≫ f i)] [∀ i, Epi (g i)] :
    EffectiveEpiFamilyStruct _ f where
  desc {W} φ h := EffectiveEpiFamily.desc _ (fun i => g i ≫ f i)
    (fun i => g i ≫ φ i) (fun {T} i₁ i₂ g₁ g₂ eq =>
      by simpa [assoc] using h i₁ i₂ (g₁ ≫ g i₁) (g₂ ≫ g i₂) (by simpa [assoc] using eq))
  fac {W} φ h i := by
    dsimp
    rw [← cancel_epi (g i), ← assoc, EffectiveEpiFamily.fac _ (fun i => g i ≫ f i)]
  uniq {W} φ h m hm := EffectiveEpiFamily.uniq _ (fun i => g i ≫ f i) _ _ _
    (fun i => by rw [assoc, hm])
```

> I think we should prove the more general result using epi instead of split epi. Here is a chunk of code for the case of effective epi:

Of course, I didn't realise this! I'll change it. For the other direction, one needs split though, or some nice properties of the category.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8579481218/job/23514514400)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8579481218/job/23514514582)
Here (and below), you should use the `IsSplitEpi` API: `section_` and the lemma `IsSplitEpi.id`.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(CategoryTheory): a family is effective epi iff its precomposition with a family of split epis is
